Class OvertimeService

  • java.lang.Object

public class OvertimeService
extends SecureService
    Contains REST endpoints for overtime

    • Method Detail

      • setOvertime

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response setOvertime(Overtime overtime)
        POST register overtime (used by employee-user) uses session userID if the user is not an admin
        Parameters:
        overtime - - Overtime obj
        Returns:
        status 200 if registered, status 400 if not successful

      • getOvertimeByUserId

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getOvertimeByUserId()
        uses the session to get the ID of the user to fetch an arraylist of overtime
        Returns:
        response with arraylist of Overtime obj

      • getOvertimeByShiftId

        @GET
 @Path(value="/shiftId/{shiftId}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getOvertimeByShiftId(@PathParam(value="shiftId")
                                                                                                                                      int shiftId,
                                                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                      int userId)
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - the ID of the shift
        userId - - the ID of the employee
        Returns:
        Response with ArrayList with Overtime obj for all registered overtime for given shift
